Passage:  The Montreal Canadiens and the Seattle Metropolitans appearance totals include the 1919 Stanley Cup Finals that ended with a no-decision because of the Spanish flu epidemic. The Chicago Blackhawks were known as the Chicago Black Hawks prior to the 1986–87 season.  The Dallas Stars totals include two series losses as the Minnesota North Stars.  The Anaheim Ducks totals include one series loss as the Mighty Ducks of Anaheim.  The modern Ottawa Senators (1992–present) are the namesake of the original Senators (1883–1934).
